CustomField.description: The day on which recurring items are created. For Weekly/Biweekly schedules, this is a day of the week (e.g. Monday). For Monthly/Quarterly schedules, this is a day of the month (e.g. 1, 15).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Day of week (e.g. Monday) for weekly/biweekly, or day of month (e.g. 1, 15) for monthly/quarterly.
CustomField.label: Recurrence Day
